xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/921257-A Bad Stroke of Luck 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/e5Za4th9WI9Grl5fkuEQzBhs63u.jpg Four stories of normal Montevideans like you and me, but with one thing in common: bad luck. One figure, the master of the ceremony, ties stories together commenting on the failures of those four people, as he tries to make his fortune on a slot-machine. A Bad Stroke of Luck
